content: knitted jumper in drops belle or drops sky the piece is worked top down with saddle shoulders and short sleeves pattern no vs-070 yarn group b **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops belle from garnstudio 300-300-350-350-400-450 g colour 10 moss green or drops sky from garnstudio 200-200-200-250-250-300 g colour 07 light sea green **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm **needles ** drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for rib
